# Kenyan High Commissioner to the United Kingdom

|style           =
|residence       =
|nominator       =

|appointer       =
|appointerpost   =

The Kenyan high commissioner in London is the official representative of the government in Nairobi to the government of the United Kingdom.

|Ngethe Njoroge
|Ng'ethe Njoroge was appointed Kenya's high commissioner in London. Njoroge was the brother of Njoroge Mungai, the minister for foreign affairs, and a relative of Kenyatta.
